scriptedEmail.name: Forum Disabled
scriptedEmail.description: Sends an email when a user tries to post via email to a forum that's disabled.
scriptedEmail.languageResources: <language key="en-us"> <resource name="Body">Your message could not be sent to {forum_name} or distributed to the group members. Unfortunately, the group owner has disabled this forum. For further options, please contact the group owner or site administrator.</resource> <resource name="Subject">Message not posted: forum disabled</resource> <resource name="Header">Message not posted: forum disabled</resource> </language>
